data.post_excerpt:
Abermat is a polymer of galacturonic acid, a natural exopolysaccharide excreted by microorganisms cultivated in a bioreactor. Testing on cheeks and chins has shown that 2.00% Abermat absorbed excess sebum and reduced shine on the face.
*An alternate version, Abermat PA, preserved with Phenethyl Alcohol is available upon request.

*An alternate version, Abermat PA, preserved with Phenethyl Alcohol is available upon request.

data.post_excerpt: AcquaCell is a natural complex combining Watermelon Rind Extract, Apple Extract, and Lentil Fruit Extract. AcquaCell hydrates skin for immediate and lasting results by supplying the skin with key Natural Moisturizing Factors. After two weeks of treatment with 3.00% AcquaCell the skin showed improvements in the key moisturizers; Sodium Lactate, Sodium PCA, and Citrulline and significantly reduced the appearance of fine lines, “plumping” the cells in 20 volunteers.

data.post_excerpt:
Actineyes is an association of oligoalginate and seawater enriched with microalgae undergoing arctic stress. Actineyes at 0.10% in vitro polymerizes actin, a key protein to tighten collagen. Confirmed in vivo to reduce lines (up to 39%), firm the skin (up to 50%), and reduce bag volume (up to 33%) all under the eyes in 28 days while some benefits can be observed instantly.
*An alternate version, Actineyes PA, preserved with Phenethyl Alcohol is available upon request.

data.product_description: The skin around the eye is designed to be thin and flexible to withstand constant motion making it sensitive and prone to the effects of pollution and aging. Actineyes is a marine complex designed to restore a key protein under the eye to reduce sagging and increase firmness.

data.post_excerpt:
Adipolin is an extract of Brazilian Pepper, a kind of cashew with a fruit-like appearance. Is is tested at 0.10% for 4 weeks on 25 people reduced the waistline by up to one inch. Adipolin decreases perilipin (a strong enveloping protein) and therefore weakens the adipocyte structure.
 
*This product contains a California Prop 65 ingredient which may be considered exempt. Please refer to our Technical Dossier or contact technical@barnetproducts.com.

data.post_excerpt:
Aesthigel is a type of carrageenan obtained by supercritical CO2 depolymerization of Furcellaria lumbricalis (Algae found in the Baltic Sea). It was tested in vivo to be a superior moisturizer when compared to Hyaluronic Acid, an industry standard. Hyaluronic Acid must be used for 2 weeks to reach the moisturization levels Aesthigel achieves in just 24 hours.
*An alternate version, Aesthigel PA, preserved with Phenethyl Alcohol is available upon request.
** Aesthigel is the China compliant version of AesthiNet.

data.post_excerpt:
Algotan G is a unique polysaccharide complex from brown algae, magnesium and manganese. It is tested in vivo to accelerate tanning in the sun. Algotan G binds to endothelin receptors on melanocytes acting as a “key” to unlock the synthesis of melanin. It was tested to increase the production of melanin (in vitro) at as little as 0.04%.
*Algotan G is the alternate version of Algotan P, available upon special request.

data.post_excerpt: Allosteris is an engineered complex of soy including phospho and lysosphingolipids, mono and diglycerides, polyamino acids and sugar. It is tested in vivo at 1.00% to reduce wrinkles by 56% in 3 months. In addition, Allosteris was tested in vivo to increase the anti-aging effect of peptides and retinol. It does so by increasing the fluidity of cell membranes, resulting in better adhesion of signaling molecules such as peptides and retinol.

data.post_excerpt: AminoHydrane® PDR is a sodium salt of polyaspartic acid created from the amino acid L-aspartic acid. Utilizing Aspartic Acid to create a polymer produces a high affinity anionic moisturizer which forms a flexible film on the skin and hair via bio-adhesion. AminoHydrane® PDR creates a barrier that protects and retains moisture on the skin.

data.post_excerpt: Angelys is extracted from the roots of Angelica acutiloba in Hokkaido and developed to disperse melanin in Keratinocytes. Angelys activates cathepsins, protease enzymes in lysosomal bags. Once reduced they digest the membrane of melanosomes (the bag of melanin) and disperse the melanin in the cell so the melanin becomes invisible to the eyes. When tested at 0.065%, Angelys increased Cathepsin K by 72%.

Angelys activates cathepsins, protease enzymes in lysosomal bags. When tested at 0.065%, Angelys increased Cathepsin K by 72%.

data.post_excerpt:
Arophira is a lipophilic extract of Rock Samphire, a sea fennel that lives on rocky, steep coasts designed to function similar to Retinol. Arophira improves skin thickness, reduces wrinkles, regulates sebum production, and perfectly absorbs into the skin without inducing an inflammatory reaction.
*An alternate version, VitAphira, without Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil is available upon request.

data.post_excerpt: Atoligomer is a balanced cocktail of minerals in micromineral form (size <50um). It is rich in macroelements such as calcium, potassium, sodium and magnesium, and in trace elements such as iron, manganese, selenium and zinc. Atoligomer helps to restore the trace element equilibrium of the skin. It contains 71 of the 92 elements in Mendelev’s classification system which are known to exist naturally in the body.

data.post_excerpt:
BarPore 42 is a biotech molecule created by reverse engineering. In order to reduce pore size, the Lysophosphatidic Acid (LPA) receptor needs to be activated. BarPore 42 is LPA, which activates the LPA receptor. Twice daily applications of BarPore 42 at 0.10% showed a 20% reduction in the number and size of pores.
** BarPore 42 is the China compliant version of Disapore 20.

data.post_excerpt: Bartone MW-300 features a patented technology developed to allow the use of all types of oils such as silicones, esters, triglycerides, and hydrocarbons into water based fluid systems such as toners. Bartone MW-300 is a concentrated nano-emulsion which can simply be added to water to create milky white toners. This unique concentrate enables formulators to easily create nano-emulsion formulas without the use of high pressure homogenization.

data.post_excerpt:
Benoiderm is a marine exopolysaccharide secreted by a planktonic microorganism from Aber Benoit, France. It was tested in vivo at 1.00% to build a healthy stratum corneum. Benoiderm was also tested to increase cell renewal, reduce stinging and improve skin immunity.
*An alternate version, Benoiderm PA, preserved with Phenethyl Alcohol is available upon special request.
** Benoiderm is the China compliant version of Benoitine.

data.post_excerpt: BioFense is a ferment created from probiotic bacteria, Lactobacillus plantarum. The fermentation involves providing a food source for the bacteria to thrive. This results in an abundance of Peptidoglycan and Lipotechoic Acid, which both induce beta-defensins. BioFense is a probiotic-like that favors the beneficial bacteria while discouraging harmful bacteria.

data.post_excerpt:
Blanchys is an exopolysaccharide (EPS) of galacturonic acid, N-acetyl glucosamine and galactose grafted with amino acids serine and alanine allowing the EPS to be in the shape of micro-vesicles able to penetrate the skin. Therefore, this EPS will compete with sugars in the skin and limit the sugar-dependent contact between melanocytes and keratinocytes. Blanchys was tested in vivo at 1.00% on 25 asian volunteers for 3 months; 24 recognized that they had less dark spots.
 
*An alternate version, Blanchys PA, preserved with Phenethyl Alcohol is available upon special request.

data.post_excerpt:
Pollution or stressors can come in multiple forms such as external environment, chemical treatments and mechanical aggressors. Everyday external factors cause brittle, weakened hair fibers creating an overall unhealthy hair appearance. Capineat, derived from the red alga Furcellaria lumbricalis, is a high molecular weight polysaccharide able to adhere to the cuticle providing a resurfacing, protective effect on the hair fiber.
 
*An alternate version, Capineat PA, preserved with Phenethyl Alcohol is available upon special request.
data.post_excerpt_full:
Pollution or stressors can come in multiple forms such as external environment, chemical treatments and mechanical aggressors. Everyday external factors cause brittle, weakened hair fibers creating an overall unhealthy hair appearance. Capineat, derived from the red alga Furcellaria lumbricalis, is a high molecular weight polysaccharide able to adhere to the cuticle providing a resurfacing, protective effect on the hair fiber.

data.post_excerpt:
Scalp ecology is a permanent interaction between microbiota and mycobiota. A dysbiosis of the two groups is characterized by dandruff and the collateral symptoms are itching, irritation, and scalp tightness. CapiSoothe contains aromatic water of lavender to activate the release of soothing molecules and exopolysaccharides known to optimize the communication between microorganisms, and marine amino acids beneficial to restore scalp condition. CapiSoothe reduces scalp dryness, flakiness, and itchiness while rebalancing the ecology of the scalp.
 
*An alternate version, CapiSoothe-SB, preserved with sodium benzoate is available upon special request.

data.post_excerpt:
Clari-Lys is an aqueous extract of a beautiful white lily, Pancatium maritimum, found on the northern beaches of Chania (Crete) and the Hoedic Islands off Bretagne, France. It is tested in vivo at 1.50% to reduce the appearance of age spots. Clari-Lys reduces communication between nerves, keratinocytes and melanocytes. As a result, it reduces the synthesis of melanin and the dendricity of melanocytes.
 
** Clari-Lys is the China compliant version of Clari-Net.

data.post_excerpt: CMT-30 is a plant-derived, sulfate-free mild cleansing surfactant made for sensitive skin. CMT-30 has excellent cleansing properties while not stripping the lipids from the skin. Its high purity allows for the creation of transparent cleansing liquids with great foaming properties. It also has positive effects on hair health, including cuticle protection and reduction in scalp flaking. When used in shampoos, CMT-30 imparts a smooth conditioning texture even after rinse-off.

data.post_excerpt: Corneopatch is made up of a large number of mineral sheets (including chlorella, citric acid and lactic acid) which open up in the shape of a helix. Once applied to the skin the helix structure opens, releasing the active but also covering the surface of the skin . Tested at 1.00%, Corneopatch gives an instant blurring effect which lasts for 8 hours. Transepidermal water loss is reduced by up to 50% after 4 hours.

data.post_excerpt: Cortisol is affected by emotional and environmental stress. Cortinhib G has been tested and found to control the underlying causes of Cortisol production. In vitro, discoveries highlight the damage done by cortisol: less adhesion proteins, less glycosaminoglycans (GAG), more hyaluronidase activity, and less antioxidant enzymes. Cortinhib G inhibits this damage.

data.post_excerpt:
Dermochlorella DG is an aqueous extract of the green microalgae, Chorella vulgaris. It is rich in amino acids. Dermochlorella DG is tested in vivo at 1.00% to improve skin firmness. Dermochlorella DG increases the synthesis of proteins which anchor the derm-epidermal junction. In addition to its firming properties, it is tested to reduce dark circles, spider veins, stretch marks and heavy legs.
 
*Dermochlorella DG is the alternate version of Chlorellagen DP, available upon special request.

data.post_excerpt:
DiasPore 20 is a biotech molecule created by reverse engineering. In order to reduce pore size, the Lysophosphatidic Acid (LPA) receptor needs to be activated. DisaPore 20 is LPA, which activates the LPA receptor. Twice daily applications of DisaPore 20 at 0.10% showed a 20% reduction in the number and size of pores.
 
**For a China compliant version, we are pleased to offer BarPore 42.

data.post_excerpt: Evodiox is an extract from the fruit of the Chinese Evodia plant. The Evodia plant is used in the ancient elixir Wu-Zhu-Yu, which has been used for generations in China to soothe inflammation, reduce pain, relieve indigestion and ulcers, and heal wounds. Evodiox is tested in vivo to suppress inflammation induced by methyl Nicotinate.

data.post_excerpt: Grenadys is a powder extracted from Pomegranate. Pomegranate has gained superfruit status due to its exceptional antioxidant activity associated with its rich polyphenolics. Grenadys is significantly stronger (up to 20 times) than Kojic Acid in vitro. Grenadys tested in vivo at 0.30% reduced the age spot by 32% in average after 3 months as acknowledged by 100% of the volunteers.

data.post_excerpt: HikariBleu is an extract of the Japanese plant, Artemisia capillaris and fights the effects of Blue Light. Rich in polyphenols from nature in her untouched state, HikariBleu neutralizes redox cascades induced by radiation. It reduces the degree of carbonylation and its consequences in the epidermis and dermis, limiting signs of accelerated aging and preserving the skin’s tone and youthfulness.

data.post_excerpt: HydraDuct-B3 is an entrapping structure to sequester B3 precursors from pumpkin seeds, squash seeds and bacillus ferment. The B3 precursors bring a variety of benefits including increasing ceramide synthesis, soothing properties, stimulation mitochondrial activity and metabolism.

data.post_excerpt:
Kukui Seed Oil is a rich, lubricous plant oil containing approximately 42% Omega 6 (Linoleic Acid) and 30% Omega 3 (Linolenic Acid). Kukui Seed Oil absorbs quickly into the skin without an oily after feel. Kukui Seed Oil was able to reduce UV induced erythema and n vivo testing shows it effectively delivers fatty acids into the skin.
 
*An organic version, Kukui Seed Oil Organic, is available upon special request.

data.post_excerpt:
Lachestim is a lipophilic extract of the “crystal tears” of the Pistacia lentiscus tree. It is tested in vivo at 0.20% to increase the density of skin supporting fibers (collagen). It does so by increasing the expression of the youth proteins FOXO and KLOTHO.
 
*This product contains a California Prop 65 ingredient which may be considered exempt. Please contact technical@barnetproducts.com. with questions.

data.post_excerpt: Lecinol S-10 is a unique phospholipid emulsifier comprised mainly of Phosphatidylcholine which is the primary phospholipid found in the cell membrane of cells located in the epidermis. Lecinol S-10 creates an Oil-in-Water (O/W) emulsion in which some oil droplets have a lipid bilayer surrounding them which mimics the structure of the skin. It is a very potent emulsifier, stabilizing emulsions at low concentrations. Lecinol S-10 works to replenish the main phospholipid of the epidermis while also reducing skin damage, reducing irritation, reducing melanin synthesis, and increasing active deposition, strengthening the skin barrier, and providing instant and long-term moisturization.
data.post_excerpt_full: Lecinol S-10 is a unique phospholipid emulsifier comprised mainly of Phosphatidylcholine which is the primary phospholipid found in the cell membrane of cells located in the epidermis. Lecinol S-10 creates an Oil-in-Water (O/W) emulsion in which some oil droplets have a lipid bilayer surrounding them which mimics the structure of the skin. It is a very potent emulsifier, stabilizing emulsions at low concentrations. Lecinol S-10 works to replenish the main phospholipid of the epidermis while also reducing skin damage, reducing irritation, reducing melanin synthesis, and increasing active deposition, strengthening the skin barrier, and providing instant and long-term moisturization.

data.post_excerpt:

data.post_excerpt: NET-APS is an Alpha-Gel emulsifier that forms a protective film on the skin. The unique lamellar arrangement for this type of Oil-in-Water (O/W) emulsion can control water loss from within the stratum corneum. NET-APS provides many beneﬁts such as ease of emulsiﬁcation for many types of oils, long lasting hydration, ﬁne line improvement, instant moisturization and long-term barrier improvement. It is an excellent system former for use in skin care, color, and lip formulations.

data.post_excerpt: NET-LCS PF is a PEG-Free complex that forms a multi-layer lamellar crystal structure that mimics the skin, consisting of similar components (phospholipids, fatty acids, triglycerides, etc.). These emulsions create a gel-cream that moisturizes the skin due to the fact that it entraps 13.0-19.0% bound water in the lamellar structure. NET-LCS PF emulsions were tested to increase moisturization, improve the condition of the stratum corneum and form a long lasting hydrophobic barrier on the skin.

These emulsions create a gel-cream that moisturizes the skin due to the fact that it entraps 13.0-19.0% bound water in the lamellar structure. NET-LCS PF emulsions were tested to increase moisturization, improve the condition of the stratum corneum and form a long lasting hydrophobic barrier on the skin.

data.post_excerpt: NET-SMT is a unique Alpha-Gel mild anionic emulsifier that provides enhanced electrolyte tolerance, allowing for the incorporation of salts and salt-based actives that would normally destabilize Oil-in Water (O/W) formulas. The unique arrangement for this type of O/W emulsions can control water loss from within the stratum corneum. NET-SMT is suitable for both skincare and color cosmetics.

data.post_excerpt: NET-WAX AGE BAT is a co-emulsifier used to stabilize and thicken emulsions at very low concentrations. It can be used in O/W, W/O, and anhydrous formulations. NET-WAX AGE BAT has been tested to reduce UV-B induced inflammation, effectively boosting SPF values. It adds a matte finish to formulations, leaving skin feeling moisturized, toned and tightened. It can be utilized in a variety of skin, sun and color products for its anti-inflammatory efficacy and texture modifying properties.

data.post_excerpt:
Neurocap is the first active in the industry developed to reduce the aging of neurons and the impact of them on fibroblast activity. Tested at 1.50% for two months, Neurocap decreased the volume of wrinkles and the area by 14%. It also was shown to increase skin smoothness by 11%.
 
*An alternate preservative-free version, Neurocap G, is available upon special request.
data.post_excerpt_full:
Neurocap is the first active in the industry developed to reduce the aging of neurons and the impact of them on fibroblast activity. Tested at 1.50% for two months, Neurocap decreased the volume of wrinkles and the area by 14%. It also was shown to increase skin smoothness by 11%.
 
*An alternate preservative-free version, Neurocap G, is available upon special request.
data.product_description: Neurocap is an oligosaccharide mainly composed of 2 acids obtained by a patented depolymerization process from brown algae. When nerves age, stimulation of the fibroblasts decreases causing the fibroblasts to produce less collagen and elastin. This phenomenon is known as neuro-aging. Neurocap protects nerve endings and maintains healthy communications between nerves and fibroblasts thus preventing neuro-aging.

data.post_excerpt: Olivys-EA is an active containing phospholipidic fractions of olive stem cells. Within these fractions, strong mitochondrial lipids known as RAFTS exist that can ‘charge’ aged mitochondria by creating fusion and fission (by stimulating the mitochondrial synapses) to restore energy. Olivys-EA protects and optimizes the energy of cells to keep the skin healthy and beautiful.

data.post_excerpt:
Pheohydrane G is a complex of a polysaccharide extracted from Laminaria digitata (brown algae) and amino acids extracted from the microalgae Chlorella vulgaris. It is tested in vivo to have great moisturization results. The polysaccharide provides moisturization properties while the amino acids provide substantivity to the skin.
 
*Pheohydrane G is the alternate version of Pheohydrane P, available upon special request.

Phyko AI-PF is a concentrated solution of an oligosaccharide from Laminaria digitata, a brown algae. It is tested in vivo to reduce inflammation in 15 minutes (induced by depilatory wax). *An alternate version, Phyko-AIG, without preservatives is available upon special request.

Phyko AP-PF is an oligosaccharide solution extracted from brown seaweed, formed by a chain of mannuronic acid and guluronic acid. Ex vivo results tested at 2.50% prove protection against cigarette smoke, heavy metals and pesticides. The sugar acts as a blotter, complexing the polluting molecule to protect the skin.
 
*An alternate version, Phyko-APG, without preservatives is available upon special request.

data.post_excerpt: Phytofix, solubilized in Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, is a unique and optimized blend containing soluble sphingolipids, triglycerides and sterols. In vivo tests at 1.00% for 3 weeks showed that Phytofix reduces lines & wrinkles by 60%, reduces flakiness by 45%, improves skin smoothness by 100% and radiance by 50% in two weeks. In vitro tests showed that Phytofix activated PPAR-Alpha (by an increase in water retention and a decrease in stinging).

data.post_excerpt: Pol'Away is a stable complex (zinc-glycine) molecule. Tested in vivo at 1.00% to decrease skin pigmentation. Pol'Away decreased the synthesis of tyrosinase, therefore reducing the amount of melanin produced.
data.post_excerpt_full: Pol'Away is a stable complex (zinc-glycine) molecule. Tested in vivo at 1.00% to decrease skin pigmentation. Pol'Away decreased the synthesis of tyrosinase, therefore reducing the amount of melanin produced.
data.product_description: Zinc in its ionized form has poor penetrating ability. In order to solve this problem we synthesized and examined various types of zinc complexes containing different amino acids. Pol’Away is best able to penetrate the cells and induce protein expression for a brighter complexion.

data.post_excerpt: Polyolprepolymer-14 (PP-14) forms a long-lasting liquid reservoir in the stratum corneum and epidermis. It decreases irritation and significantly influences the deposition of skin care and actives on the skin; yet, because of its high molecular weight, Polyolprepolymer-14 remains within the top layer of the skin. Polyolprepolymer-14 is tasteless in formulations which makes it particularly suitable for products used on and around the lip area.

It decreases irritation and significantly influences the deposition of skin care and actives on the skin; yet, because of its high molecular weight, Polyolprepolymer-14 remains within the top layer of the skin. Polyolprepolymer-14 is tasteless in formulations which makes it particularly suitable for products used on and around the lip area.

data.post_excerpt: Skin Dysbiosis (microbial imbalance) occurs in different situations such as acne, skin redness, and inflammation. Quorum Sensing, a communication system between microbes, has a key role within microbe to microbe and human to microbe interactions. Quoranys was developed as a way to jam the communication between bacteria specifically involved in acne to restore the biodiversity on the skin and improve the overall appearance of the skin.

data.post_excerpt:
Reversalys 30 is a combination of an extract of the first calcified algae, Jania rubens, rich in taurine produced in bioreactor and a baltic polysaccharide depolymerized with a patented technology. Created for millennials, tested on millennials to boost the level of energy in their skin and erase the early sign of age.
 
*An alternate version, Reversalys PA, preserved with Phenethyl Alcohol is available upon special request.

data.post_excerpt:
Roxisomes is a DNA repair enzyme encapsulated in a liposome. The liposome is designed to break down inside the cell, releasing the enzyme. Roxisomes is tested to repair 8-oxo-guanine damage (oxidative damage) to DNA. Roxisomes shortens the time for nucleus DNA to repair from 24 hours to 2 hours.
*An alternate version, Roxisomes-PF, preserved with Hydroxyacetophenone and Phenethyl Alcohol is available upon special request.

Scopariane G is an extract from the brown algae Sphacelaria scoparia. This photophile species lives in the calm to semi-rough regions of the Mediterranean and in Corsica, France. Scopariane G prevents adipocyte formation, prevents lipogenesis, and increases collagen synthesis.
 
*Scopariane G is the alternate version of Scopariane P, available upon special request.

data.post_excerpt:
One in 3 women age 25 to 40 say they are affected by the regular appearance of acne-type lesions or cutaneous blemishes. Cutaneous blemishes reflect a reduction in anti-microbial protection and imbalance in the cutaneous microbiota. SeaBiome is a fermented marine postbiotic to rebalance the bacterial ecosystem. This marine postbiotic was specifically chosen because bacterioplankton and human microbiota are 73% similar therefore, this compound, produced by planktonic bacterium, is able to boost the cutaneous microbiota.
*An alternate version, SeaBiome-PA, preserved with Phenethyl Alcohol is available upon special request.

data.post_excerpt:
SpectraGLO uses a synergistic approach by breaking the system to brighten the complexion. SpectraGLO functions to reduce the signal which stimulates melanogensis, reduce the transfer of melanosomes, and break and disperse melanin. This spectrum of targets can be addressed for the first time with a cellular concentrate of rainbow algae, SpectraGLO.
 
*An alternate preservative-free version, SpectraGLO-G, is available upon special request.

data.post_excerpt: TahiVani is an oil, enriched with active molecules of Vanilla Tahitensis. Vanilla Tahitensis is a hybrid of Vanilla Planifolia and Vanilla Odorate. data.post_excerpt: Thallips is a concentrate of Dictyopteris polypodioides, a sea fern. Thallips is tested in vitro at 0.025% to 0.05% resulting in pro-adipogenic effect after 2 weeks of culture (the adipocytes produce more oil). Thallips promotes the storage and diffusion of fatty acids as confirmed in vivo on lips at 1.00% for 4 weeks: 77% of the volunteers observed a plumping effect.
data.post_excerpt_full: Thallips is a concentrate of Dictyopteris polypodioides, a sea fern. Thallips is tested in vitro at 0.025% to 0.05% resulting in pro-adipogenic effect after 2 weeks of culture (the adipocytes produce more oil). Thallips promotes the storage and diffusion of fatty acids as confirmed in vivo on lips at 1.00% for 4 weeks: 77% of the volunteers observed a plumping effect.
data.product_description: Thallips is a concentrate of a sea fern harvested in a protected sea garden. Thallips was developed to increase fat in order to achieve a plumping effect on the lips.

data.post_excerpt: Barﬁx H is a natural alternative to PVP-based ﬁlm formers. The ﬁlm-forming properties of Barﬁx H are effective in both hair and skin formulations. It is a very versatile product, as it can be used in aqueous systems, anhydrous systems and emulsions. It provides great results in applications such as shampoos, conditioners, sprayable primers, gels, mascaras, and other pigmented emulsions. In addition, Barﬁx H creates high luster ﬁlms.

data.post_excerpt: Barsolve NS-100 is a multi-functional Polyglyceryl Fatty Acid Ester. This unique ingredient can function as a D-Phase emulsifier which are high internal phase emulsions with a small particle size. Once applied on the skin it melts into an oil and upon rinsing the oil self-emulsifies with water for easy rinsing. D-Phase emulsions can be easily dispersed into aqueous bases sebum cleanser or a natural solubilizer. It can also be dispersed into an aqueous gel to create a simple emulsion with low emulsifier content. D-Phase Emulsions are typically translucent gels (depending on the refractive index of the oil) that can contain up to 95% oil.

data.post_excerpt: BarSperse-15 is a dispersing agent comprised of plant-derived polyglyceryl fatty acid ester. BarSperse-15 is an excellent dispersing aid of pigments and inorganic sunscreens in an oily medium that can be used in a variety of applications such as lipsticks, foundations, mascaras and many other formulations. It has excellent oxidation and electrolyte stability, is almost odorless and imparts no color in formulations.

data.post_excerpt:
Benoitine is a marine exopolysaccharide secreted by a planktonic microorganism from Aber Benoit, France. It was tested in vivo at 1.00% to build a healthy stratum corneum. Benoitine was also tested to increase cell renewal, reduce stinging and improve skin immunity.
 
*Benoitine PA is the alternate version of Benoitine, available upon special request.
 
**For a China compliant version, we are pleased to offer Benoiderm.

data.post_excerpt:
Bresderm is an exopolysacharide produced by plankton found from the Mer d’Iroise of Brest in Bretagne in France. It is tested in vivo at 2.00% to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in 15 minutes. Wrinkle reduction results from Bresderm were tested to last 6 hours.
 
*An alternate version, Bresderm PA, preserved with Phenethyl Alcohol is available upon special request.
 
** Bresderm is the China compliant version of Brestine.

data.post_excerpt:
NET WS-CF is a proprietary complex designed to create D5-Free Water-in-Silicone macroemulsions that provides water break textures. NET WS-CF emulsions have light aesthetics during application due to the high-water phase present. Upon dry down a thin silicone film is provided leaving the skin feeling smooth. NET WS-CF is also highly recommended for color cosmetic emulsions as it stabilizes, suspends, and extends the wear of pigments.
*An alternate version with D5, NET-WO, is also available.

data.post_excerpt: NET-LCS is a complex that forms a multi-layer lamellar crystal structure that mimics the skin, consisting of similar components (phospholipids, fatty acids, triglycerides, etc.). These emulsions create a gel-cream that moisturizes the skin due to the fact that it entraps 13.0-19.0% bound water in the lamellar structure. NET-LCS emulsions were tested in vivo to increase moisturization, improve the condition of the stratum corneum and form a long lasting hydrophobic barrier on the skin.

data.post_excerpt: NET-WO NS is a proprietary mixture of Polyglyceryl Fatty Acid Esters and Hectorite to form a pickering architecture. NET-WO NS creates stable Water-in-Oil (W/O) emulsions that do not have an oily after feel. The stabilizing mechanism forms a synergy with solid particles and in the case of mineral sunscreens provides an SPF boosting effect. NET-WO NS is a unique system that can create a wide range of products including sunscreens, milks, pigmented formulas and much more. It is also highly recommended for color cosmetic emulsions as it stabilizes, suspends, and extends the wear of pigments.

data.post_excerpt: NET-WRS is a polymeric emulsifier that creates jelly textures that can provide a water or oil break on skin. When neutralized, the polymer and surfactants interact causing a synergistic effect that results in a significant increase in viscosity and gives the system its unique gelling properties. It is a low energy system requiring no heat and low shear. It can be utilized to create innovative textures such as viscous sprayable gels, shape memory gels/emulsions, jelly textures and more.
